channel.title: Avatar Legends: Tales from Ba Sing Se
channel.description:
**Avatar Legends: Tales from Ba Sing Se** 4 sessions on Thursdays in May at 2pm EDT (UTC-4)
This is a four session-run of Avatar Legends, a PBTA game set in the fantasy world of Avatar: The Last Airbender and the Legend of Korra. No experience with the system or familiarity with the setting is needed.
Rules will be taught. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged.
**Content warnings**: Non-graphic violence, harm to children
This four-session run will begin in Ba Sing Se, the capital of the Earth Kingdom, during the life of Avatar Kyoshi. It is a time of government corruption, and outlaw groups that have risen to fill the gaps.
The Avatar and her companions aren’t the only heroes in the world. Your team of young heroes – martial artists, benders or technology experts – will seek to protect the innocent and pursue justice, as they each discern what values they care about most.
In the first session we will go over safety and tone, build characters and establish connections, and start our first episode.
Note: This is my first time running Avatar: Legends, so please only sign up if you’re willing to deal with a GM finding her feet. Thanks.
We will use Streamyard for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links and a Hangouts chat to discuss playbook preferences. Sessions will run up to three hours, with 5-10 minute breaks every hour. The [Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines & Veils, a Romance Checklist, and the X-Card for safety tools.
